phrases.phrase: Display activity notifications by the bot
Enable editor BB code toggle button
Display notifications from selected forums only
Hide message content from selected user groups
Display user count in navigation tab
After the last post in a room, user will be considered active in that room for the specified time, before becoming idle.
If enabled, activity notification messages will be displayed by the bot. Else, the rich username of the user who triggered the notification will be used instead.
Display an ad above the chat editor. If you add multiple ads, they will rotate randomly with each page load.
Display an ad below the chat editor. If you add multiple ads, they will rotate randomly with each page load.
The maximum number of messages to display per page.
If enabled, users will be automatically logged in in the rooms they joined if they are inactive when the chat loads.
If enabled, user avatar will be displayed in message list before the username.
If enabled, user avatar will be displayed in user list before the username.
The name of the bot that will be used to post system notifications in the chat. You can use HTML to style the name.
Select the rooms joined by default for first time chat users.
Default miscellaneous settings for first time chat users.
Default desktop notification settings for first time chat users.
Default sound settings for first time chat users.
This option allows you to automatically delete messages that are older than x days. Set to 0 to disable it.
If checked, this will remove the smilie button from the editor.
Select which custom BB codes you want to disable in the chat. Hold down CTRL key to select multiple options or to deselect certain options.
Select how the chat will be displayed to users.
If enabled, chat title will change based on the current active tab.
If checked, a submit button will be added in the editor text box.
If checked, this will enable the BB code toggle editor button.
This option allows you to globally switch on/off the chat.
Select which BB codes can be used in the chat.
Users will have to wait this many seconds between posting messages. Users with the permission "Can bypass flood check" will be exempt from this option.
(Optional) Set the name of the bot that will display the notifications. You can use HTML to style the name.
This option allows you to display notifications from certain forums only.
If enabled, notifications of new posts will be posted in the forum activity notification room.
If enabled, an excerpt will be posted below the post notification. The second value represents the excerpt length. Set to 0 to display the full post.
If a room is selected, forum activity notifications will be posted in that room.
If enabled, notifications of new threads will be posted in the forum activity notification room.
If enabled, notifications of new users will be posted in the forum activity notification room.
If you set a guest room, guests will be able to post in this room without having to register.
This option allows you to hide the message content from certain user groups.
After the active status, user will be considered idle for the set time, before being removed from the chatters list.
If enabled, users will be kept logged in in the rooms they joined if they stop posting but still viewing the chat.
The maximum number of characters that can be in a message. This includes BB code. Use 0 to disable the limit.
Replace message content characters with anything you want.
Set the number of messages to display in the chat when the chat loads.
If checked, users can add multi-line messages using the Shift + Enter key.
Set a Font Awesome icon for the chat navigation tab.
This option allows you to display in the chat navigation tab the number of users.
Display a notice above the chat messages. If you add multiple notices, they will rotate randomly.
Notification will hide automatically after the set time.
If enabled, users can chat in a dedicated page.
If enabled, users can chat in private.
The number of seconds between chat refreshes for active users when chat is visible.
The number of seconds between chat refreshes for active users when chat is hidden.
The number of seconds between chat refreshes for inactive users when chat is visible.
The number of seconds between chat refreshes for inactive users when chat is hidden.
Notifications that will be posted in the chat by the bot.
If enabled, users can chat in rooms.
Set the ordering for room list.
Display a set of rules and guidelines for chat users.
If enabled, users can set a status that will be displayed under their username in chatters list.
The maximum length a status can have.
If enabled, new messages will display a notification in the browser tab of the chat page if the tab is inactive.
If you have set a thread ID for a chat room, this option allows you to set the minimum length required for a chat message in order to be posted in the thread. Set to 0 to post any message.
The maximum number of users to display in the top.
If enabled, users can receive alert notifications when they are mentioned in room messages. Users will have to opt in via their chat settings in order to receive alert notifications.
If enabled, @ button will be added in front of the username in message list for quick user tagging.
Set the ordering for user list.
(Optional) Set the name of the bot that will display the notifications. You can use HTML to style the name.
If enabled, notifications of new media comments will be posted in the XFMG activity notification room.
If enabled, notifications of new media albums will be posted in the XFMG activity notification room.
If enabled, notifications of new media items will be posted in the XFMG activity notification room.
If a room is selected, XenForo Media Gallery activity notifications will be posted in that room.
(Optional) Set the name of the bot that will display the notifications. You can use HTML to style the name.
If a room is selected, XenForo Resource Manager activity notifications will be posted in that room.
Time limit on editing/deleting own messages (minutes)
Room author can mute and kick users
Please make sure that guests' time zone corresponds to your time zone.
Are you sure you want to logout from the chat? This action will log you out from all joined rooms.
You must enable bot messages in your chat user settings.
The name of the bot that will return the response.
The response that will be returned. You can add multiple responses by placing each one on a new line.
The minimum interval in minutes between responses.
The keyword that will trigger the response. You can add multiple keywords by placing each one on a new line.
You cannot start a private conversation with {user}.
Use this command followed by the username of a user, length (hours|days|weeks|months|years|permanent) and a reason (optional), to ban a user from the current room.
This command cannot be used in private conversations.
Information on how to use the command. This can be simple text, HTML or a phrase - phrase:my_phrase_title
Use this command followed by some keywords to find messages in the current room or in the current private conversation. To go back to the current messages, use the command with no keywords.
Use this command followed by a keyword (optional) to post a random animated GIF image from giphy.com
Use this command to display help.
Use this command followed by the username of the user you want to invite to join the current room.
Use this command followed by the name of the room, to join it.

Use this command followed by the username of a user, length (hours|days|weeks|months|years|permanent) and a reason (optional), to kick a user from the current room. If no length is provided, the kick will last 1 hour.
Use this command followed by a message (optional) to leave the current room.
Use this command followed by a message (optional) to leave all joined rooms.
Use this command followed by a short message, to display that message in third person.
Use this command followed by the username of a user and a message separated by comma to start a private conversation with someone.

Use this command followed by the username of a user, length (hours|days|weeks|months|years|permanent) and a reason (optional), to mute a user in the current room. If no length is provided, the mute will last 1 hour.

Use this command to display your custom created user commands. To create or update a custom command, type the command name with double slashes followed by your desired message. To delete a custom command, type the command name with double slashes followed by the keyword delete. To use a custom command, simply type the command name with double slashes.
The name of the command that will be used after the /
Use this command to set a guest nickname.
This command is not available for this room.
Allows you to include a template that contains your custom command options that you can use in the callback.

Use this command to delete all the messages from the curent room. If keyword all is used, all the chat messages will be deleted. If a username is specified, all the messages posted by that user in the current room will ne deleted.

Use this command to roll a dice. You can choose how many dices to roll and how many sides a dice will have by adding (n)d(n) where the first n is the number of dices and the second one is the number of sides. You can also specify modifiers: +n -y
Use this command followed by a text to set your chat status. Your status will be displayed under your username is user list.
Use this command followed by the username of a user, to unban that user from the current room.
Use this command followed by the username of a user, to unkick that user from the current room.
Use this command followed by the username of a user, to unmute that user in the current room.
Use this command followed by one or more usernames (separated by comma) in the format of [username1, username2] and a message, to send a private message to other users in the current room.
re you sure you want to leave this conversation?
Select the devices on which the chat will be displayed.
If enabled, the user avatar will be displayed before username.
This option allows you to enable chat only at certain hours.
If no rooms are selected, the bot message will be posted in all rooms.
Allows you to display only the user avatar in a grid style.
This option allows you to enable chat only on certain days.
Enable search if there are more than x results.
Chat has been disabled. You can enable it again from the same location.
Here you can learn about the various commands and options that you can use in the chat.

If you leave the conversation, you will no longer receive new messages from {user}. You can restart the conversation anytime, but if {user} leaves the conversation as well, all messages will be deleted from the conversation history.
Please confirm that you want to lift the sanction on the following user
Set the number of messages to display in the chat when the chat loads.
Invalid arguments. You have to specify a recipient and a message, in the format of: username, message.
{user} has commented on the media album "{album}".
{user} has added a [URL={mediaURL}]new media[/URL] in the album "{album}".
{user} has created a new media album called "{album}".
{user} has added a [URL={mediaURL}]new media[/URL] in the category "{category}".
{user} has posted a [URL={url}]new reply[/URL] in the thread "{thread}".
{user} has submitted a new resource called "{resource}" in the category "{category}".
{user} has started a new thread called "{thread}" in {forum}.
You haven't started any conversations yet.
This message doesn't have any likes yet.
There are no messages in the chat. Be the first one to say Hi!
No one is chatting at the moment.
You don't have the permission to edit this message.
You don't have the permission to use this command.
The server has not responded in time. :(
No results have been found for "{term}".
There are no user sanctions for this room.
There are currently no special chat rules.
There are no users in the top.
You haven't created any custom commands.
Your are not part of this conversation.
Please set a nickname by typing /{command} followed by the desired nickname.
Please wait at least {x} second(s) before posting a new message.
Messages that have been read by the recipient cannot be edited or deleted.
The requested bot response could not be found.
The requested conversation could not be found.
The requested guest could not be found.
The requested message could not be found.
The requested room could not be found.
The requested sanction could not be found.
The number of dices to roll by default.
The number of sides a dice will have by default.
The maximum number of dices a user can roll.
The maximum dice sides a user can roll.
You have already joined this room!
This option allows you to auto-prune messages every x hours. Set to 0 to disable it.
This room is password protected. To join the room, please provide the room password.
If locked, users won't be able to join the room until the set date.
You don't have the permission to join this room.
If checked, users who join this room won't be able to post anything.
If a thread ID is set, messages posted in this room will be posted in that thread as well.
This option allows you to enable room access based on user group.
Invalid arguments. Separate arguments by comma: username, length (x hours/days/weeks/months/years/permanent), reason (optional)
Invalid sanction length. Possible values: x hours/days/weeks/months/years/permanent
Please reload the page to see the changes.
Specify the maximum number of users that should be shown in this widget.
Type /nick followed by the desired name to set your nickname.
If set, this option allows you to display a message when the chat is not available.
Unknown custom command: //{command} Type //name value to create a custom command.
Unknown prune option. Available options: all, forum, media, resource or a valid username.
Your status will be displayed under your username in chatters list. Max {length} characters.
User has posted at least x chat messages
User has posted no more than x chat messages
{user} has not been banned from this room.
{user} has not been kicked from this room.
{user} has not been muted in this room.
Invalid arguments. You have to specify a recipient and a message in the format of: [username] message
A message is required in order to whisper.
No valid recipients have been provided.
There are no chatters in the top.
{name} has already been invited to join the room.
{name} has an active room sanction and cannot join the room.
{user} has been banned by {moderator} permanently for the following reason: {reason}
{user} has been banned by {moderator} until {date} for the following reason: {reason}
{name} has been invited to join the room.
{user} has been kicked by {moderator} permanently for the following reason: {reason}
{user} has been kicked by {moderator} until {date} for the following reason: {reason}
{user} has been muted by {moderator} permanently for the following reason: {reason}
{user} has been muted by {moderator} until {date} for the following reason: {reason}
{user} has deleted all the messages posted by {author}.
{user} has left the conversation and will not be able to see any new messages. {user} can rejoin the conversation anytime. If you leave the conversation as well, the conversation will get deleted.
{name} has invited you to join the chat room "{room}".
{name} mentioned you in a chat message.
{name} has started a private chat conversation with you.
You cannot join more than one room at the same time.
You cannot join more than {limit} rooms at the same time.
You have been banned from the chat by {author} until {date}.
You have been banned from the chat by {author} until {date} for the following reason: {reason}.
You have been banned permanently from the chat by {author}.
You have been banned permanently from the chat by {author} for the following reason: {reason}
You have been banned permanently for the following reason: {reason}.
You have been banned until {date} for the following reason: {reason}.
Your nickname has been set to "{nickname}".
Your chat sanction has been lifted.
Your status has been set to: {status}
The color of the user count badge for chat navigation and tabs when there are active users in the chat.
The color of the user count for chat navigation and tabs when there are active users in the chat.
The bar button that displays the number of chat users.
The chat bar that shows up at the bottom of the screen when using "All pages" mode.
The height of the chat content.
Individual item in the conversation user list.
Individual item in the conversation user list, active state.
Individual item in the conversation user list, hover state.
The color of the delete icon.
The color of the edit icon.
The color of the help icon.
The font size of all the icons used in the chat.
The color of the like icon.
The color of the link icon.
The height of the chat content in maximized mode.
The color of the user count badge for chat navigation and tabs when there are no active users in the chat.
The color of the user count for chat navigation and tabs when there are no active users in the chat.
The color of the options icon.
The height of the chat content on the dedicated chat page.
The color of the quote icon.
The color of the report icon.
The color of the rules icon.
The color of the sanction icon.
The color of the settings icon.
Individual tab item user count badge.
The color of the unlike icon.
Styling of the message row for user mentions.
The color of the users icon.
Customize style for Chat by Siropu.
Display Chat by Siropu top chatters.
Display Chat by Siropu active users.
